particle.description: A persistent particle packet which will follow the projectile entity.

particleLayer.description: The layer on which the particle will be displayed.
particleLayer.markdownDescription: The layer on which the `particle` will be displayed.

speed.description: The projectile speed, in pixels per second.

spawnDistance.description: The distance from the target sphere around which the projectile will be spawned, in pixels. If not set, the projectile will explode immediately at its target.

spawnSound.description: A sound event which will play when the projectile is spawned.

sphereAlgorithm.description: Which algorithm should be used to determine the target sphere.

oneOf.description: The projectile will use the homing bugs algorithm, preferring the largest groups first.
The projectile will use the lightning storm algorithm, preferring the smallest groups first.

homing.description: Whether the projectile should actively go towards the target sphere. If the target sphere is lost, the projectile will go towards its last known position.

destroyParticle.description: A one-time particle packet which will be launched when the projectile is destroyed.

destroyParticleLayer.description: The layer on which the destroyParticle will be displayed.
destroyParticleLayer.markdownDescription: The layer on which the `destroyParticle` will be displayed.

destroySound.description: A sound event which will play when the projectile is destroyed.

destroySphereSelector.description: A sphere selector which will select spheres to be destroyed, positioned on the projectile's position.

destroyScoreEvent.description: A Score Event which will be executed once for the whole batch of spheres when this projectile is destroyed.

destroyScoreEventPerSphere.description: A Score Event which will be executed separately for each Sphere that is destroyed.

destroyGameEvent.description: A Game Event which will be executed once for the whole batch of spheres when this projectile is destroyed.

destroyGameEventPerSphere.description: A Game Event which will be executed separately for each Sphere that is destroyed.
